name: TownePlace Suites Las Vegas Henderson

reviews.text: This is my favorite place to stay when flying into Vegas. Clean, comfortable hotel. Friendly, helpful staff. 10 minute drive from the Strip. Located in a quiet, upscale neighborhood with lots of great shopping nearby. Vegas is not my thing but flights to Vegas are cheap. I spend a night in Henderson and then explore Death Valley, southern California, Utah and Arizona. I always come back to this same hotel for my flight out. Plenty of good restaurants within a few minutes drive. If you want to eat in, a Smith's/Kroger is only a few blocks away and all rooms have a full kithchen. Looking forward to my next stay.
reviews.title: Always Happy Here!!

reviews.text: If you are looking for a new home in the Henderson, Green Valley or Silverado area, then there is no more perfect place to call home! It is extremely convenient to the all important I-215 and minutes away from the strip. Tons of great restaurants within 5 miles. Rooms are spacious, very, very clean, and hotel staff is very attentive and friendly. The kitchenette is very handy to store leftovers from the great restaurants. Free High Speed internet is fast and essential. High def flat screens with great assortment of premium channels. Great office and desk space with lots of storage. Water is piping hot all the time. High quality excercise equipment and quiet pool and spa. Quality items in the continental breakfast, like Activia yogurt, etc, and free coffee. This is a true value for the right person or family relocating to the area.
reviews.title: Home while shopping the foreclosure market

reviews.text: We stayed at this property using Marriott points. It has been open about a year and feels brand new. Quiet and comfortable. Breakfast is better at the neighboring Springhill Suites but okay. A great value as part of the Marriott rewards program.
reviews.title: Great new property about ten minutes from the strip.

reviews.text: This property is pretty new, but a lot of the carpeting is already really stained or worn. No full length mirror is provided and there is very little counter space. If I was only going to stay here one night, I think it would be ok. Also, the rooms are kept pretty clean.
reviews.title: Maybe okay for guys, but not for girls trying to get ready

reviews.text: Just got back from a 4 night stay, awesome place > QUIET place....great staff,clean,good free breakfast (no fired greasy crap) good healthy stuff...room was just perfect,one bedroom, kitchen and CLEAN !short drive to the strip.....very relaxing stay, I usually stay "on" the strip, this was much better....
reviews.title: Worked for me.....

reviews.text: This trip I decided I wanted a hotel with easy entry and exit, and easy parking without the 20 minute hike since I had my bicycle with me and wanted to ride around Lake Mead and through Henderson and Boulder City. TownePlace Suites really fit the bill. I had a room on the first floor, no elevators to contend with and having an onsite laundry facility was great to wash my cycling clothes. The kitchen with full sized refrigerator in the room was useful for keeping lots of water cold ad making a quick bite when I didn't have any energy left to go out for food. Interesting note, The high ceilings of TownePlace Suites is a stylish departure from Marriott's Residence Inn. If gives the feeling of spaciousness in a smaller room footprint.
reviews.title: Perfect location for another side of Vegas

reviews.text: Photos on the website were quite helpful in making my decision. Smaller hotel just 4 floors, but very well planned, with easy access to elevators, pool and lobby. They offered complimentary access to Gold's gym which was a very nice feature, but they also had a fitness room onsite. The pool was clean and I didn't feel as though I had to watch out for my hair turning green - the chemicals seemed just perfect. There were BBQs by the pool and we decided to have our dinner poolside one night it really was a delightful. Breakfast was a treat as it didn't just have sticky pastries and sweet snacks but they offered granola, yogurt, fruit, and oatmeal along with the pastries, bagels, etc. I would give the hotel a 5, with 1 as poor and 5 as great.
reviews.title: Best off strip hotel in the area!

reviews.text: This Marriott hotel is a good choice for the price, however it is 10 miles east of the strip on I-215 and if you pick your car at the airport, it is a simple ride out. We had reserved "a room" and were assigned to suite # 200 which consisted of a kitchen, a living room and two bedrooms. The suite was equipped also with 2 bright new flat TV sets, kitchen appliance, a dining table and a free WiFi connection.
reviews.title: A good choice for a perfect suite outside the town
Nice clean hotel.
reviews.text: We arrived after midnight, in January. Heating the place was slow. Gym room was well equipped, breakfast was minimal. Per request from the front desk, we were allowed to stay till 1 PM. Open air parking place was ample.

The parking place ends at another Marriott suite hotel called Spring Hill Suites, so in case there is no room in this one, you may check the other one. Over there the price is slightly lower, the suite was not as big, however breakfast had more choices.
reviews.title: Great deal for the price, but you get what you pay for

reviews.text: We spent several weeks at Towne Place Suites while our family was adopting a baby girl. The staff could not have been better....particularly Shelley, at the front desk. She was not only helpful in answering questions about the area and giving directions and recommendations, but she was genuinely interested in our situation and celebrated our new addition with us! Due to the many legal ramifications involved with an adoption, we were unable to leave the state and return home for several weeks so this became our home away from home. We can't say enough about this property and their services. They anticipated every need and were so accommodating. Marriott has another winner and we will definitely be returning!
reviews.title: Outstanding service and amenities!

reviews.text: I don't often find a hotel that I'd rate "perfect"! This hotel is about 4 years old, but it's the first time I stayed there. For only $89, the suite has all the comforts needed for a short or extended stay. In addition to the kitchenette, with full size refigerator, stove top, microwave, dishwasher, dishes, pots and pans, utensils, etc., there are plenty of cabinets, drawers, and even 2 closets! The shower head and water pressure are good in the bathroom, and the be is comfortable with 7 perfect pillows! A sofa with ottoman, and large work space with an ergonomic chair are included. Lots of outlets and free wifi, and good work lighting! The housekeeping was actually good and the staff was friendly! The fitness center (near rooms 107-109) is open 24 hours and includes 2 treadmills and an elipticle with built in TVs, and a separate weight station. The TVs actually have a lot of channels to pick from. Continental breakfast is included. Room service menus for delivery are available with a $15 min + pkg fee, tax & gratuity, so it's cheaper to go to the grocery store or bring take out back to the room. There are even outdoor grills. Shopping, golf courses and I-215 are nearby. The strip is about 10 miles away. This is a non-gambling, quiet hotel. Although I didn't use them, laundry facilities and a business center are also available.They allowed me to do an early check-in and late check-out, which really helped with my schedule.
reviews.title: Just about Perfect!

reviews.text: My only complaints would be that you can hear neighbors' doors when they come and go due to the loud latches, and dog poop outside the back door was not removed my entire stay. My only suggestion would be to add full length and makeup mirrors.
reviews.title: Decent hotel

reviews.text: Stayed at this hotel with family on May 27, 2012. The front desk and staff are friendly. The hotel property is fairly new. Hotel location is nearby restaurants and gas station. Our room had a full size kitchen appliances and utensils. Definitely family and pet friendly hotel. The breakfast buffet is ok, could be better if more items are offered. The only negative is the parking spaces, during the day there are ample parking spaces but at night it can be a challenge to find parking since this hotel share parking spaces with another Marriott property next door. Overall, this hotel is decent for its value.
reviews.title: Our New Favorite Hotel in Henderson, Nevada

reviews.text: We came out with our 5 year old to go to the NASCAR race at Las Vegas Speedway and visit relatives. We selected a hotel that was near our relatives and not to close to the speedway. Before children, we stayed on the Vegas Strip all the time but since we have evolved into parents we have to be considerate of the little ones. This hotel is defintitely family friendly and pet friendly. While we left our dog at home, there was a couple of guests with their furry best friend going through the hotel. This hotel is perfect for families because you can store formula, milk or other items that need refrigeration without worrying if it may spoil in a small fridge.
reviews.title: Affordable, Convenient, Great Staff

reviews.text: From the front desk to housekeeping, the staff is sincere in their friendliness and kindness. The lodging is great, especially if traveling with a family. Henderson is a great location to stay in the Las Vegas area--close to shops and easy access to freeways to get to the center of town. I highly recommend this property for long term stays in Las Vegas.
reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service

reviews.text: Stayed here again. This time, we got a 2 room suite. King bed with desk in master room, Queen bed in second room, pull out sofa in living area but we opted for a roll-away bed for the 5th person in our group. There wasn't much room for it but it worked out. Three flat screen TV's made everyone happy along with the full kitchen. Breakfast provided was adequate for us as we are not breakfast eaters. It includes cereal, fruit, yogurt, toast, bagels, waffles, juices, coffee etc. We did get a couple extra yogurts and apples to take back to our room for snacks later on. They do offer "room service" which is outsourced. We did not try it but liked that they had it available.
reviews.title: Still our favorite!

reviews.text: Besides being comfortable for a family of 5, what we like most.is that the beds are comfortable, sheets are soft and they have feather pillows...lots of them. The property is very clean and quiet. It is also dog friendly too. Being near the freeway is a bonus. The staff is friendly and there is a computer hub area for guests to use if you leave your laptop at home. (free Internet here!)
reviews.title: Very nice. Excellent Value.

reviews.text: It is near the Green Vally Ranch Resort if you desire gambling. Although be forwarned, it seems no one is ever winning there, including us!
reviews.title: Clean and reasonable

reviews.text: Just needed a place to sleep to catch a flight out the next morning. Was sorry I had such a short time there. Very clean. Very contemporary. Nice bedding and beds. Nice cold breakfast selections available before 6:30 a.m. on a Sat. (Some TownePlace Suites don't offer breakfast, because you have a kitchen in every unit, etc... So a nice, quick breakfast was a plus.)
reviews.title: Nicest hotel we have ever stayed at.

aka: Towneplace Suites Las Vegas Henderson Hotel
description: Welcome to the TownePlace Suites by Marriott Henderson Hotel, an extended stay, all-suite hotel that offers spacious studio, one- and two-bedroom suites for all your extended business travel or leisure travel needs.We invite you to experience the best that Henderson has to offer with your stay at the TownePlace Suites by Marriott Henderson hotel. Since we're located just 10 miles from the Las Vegas McCarran International Airport and a short drive from the Las Vegas Strip, you can enjoy easy access to area sites and attractions when you stay with us including: SEMA Auto show Henderson Pavillion Las Vegas Convention Center Lake Mead Park Bellagio Fine Art Gallery St. Rose Dominican Hospital Nellis Air Force Base The TownePlace Suites by Marriott Henderson hotel is proud to offer 24-hour guests services for your convenience, and we will accommodate you in any way possible. Our suites are designed with fully-equipped kitchens with a refrigerator, microwave, and dishwasher, so that your extended stay will always feel like a home away from home. We welcome most types of pets, and sofa beds are available in all suites so that you can make the most of your living space.
